Reviews.Title: “Hotel Albatros, Mestre, Venice”

Reviews.Content: trip venice apprehensive reviews hotel site pleasantly surprised art deco style enourmous bed comfort public lighting restaurant doubled breakfast bright ambient subdued lighting evening dining slightly extended varied menu situated rear hotel bonus main road front noisy fair amount traffic decided stay venice didnt noise disturbance hotel advertised bar midnight evening decided drink dinner closed 2230 reception drink told closed bar road late night maybe complained staff restaurant reception helpful found base stay bus stop minutes walk buses leave 15 mins centre venice 20 mins night stay reccommend pleasant vacation

Reviews.Title: “Very satisfied with the stay”

Reviews.Content: wife stayed hotel day night found quiet family type hotel hotel booked prior visit venice home country night tariff reasonable breakfast excellent actv bus 2 traveling mestre venice recommend hotel family visiting venice quiet stay

Reviews.Title: “Ideal of one or two Days Only!”
Reviews.Author: greekcypriot2009
Reviews.Content: spent 2 nights albatros supposed 4 hotel 3 actually 50 people booked travel agency basic reception staff helpful noticed suite standard ours comfortable clean venice daily traffic half hour venice coach moved slowly continental breakfast dinner poor pay internet access demand hotels book travel donâ€™t pick hotel venice

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel - no complaints from us!”
Reviews.Author: CaseyLondon
Reviews.Content: left tour italy looked hotel albatros trip advisor apprehensive read reviews expecting worst nice clean hotel situated pleasant food fine staff friendly advice judge yourself afterall cant please time

Reviews.Title: “Stay away! Not even close to a 4star hotel!”

Reviews.Content: recently stayed 2 nights bus tour worst hotel tour hairs bed shower move woke morning bug bites worse motel 6 pictures online looked pros towels dinner okay lobby dining looks nice cons location cleanliness front desk staff thin walls poor breakfast
